blogPost.excerpt: QuotaPath has integrated with HubSpot! With this CRM integration, sales reps can track quota attainment & earnings in real-time. Import HubSpot deals to automate the commission process. Close more deals, grow your revenue, and motivate your team.
blogPost.body: QuotaPath has integrated with HubSpot! With this CRM integration, sales reps can track quota attainment & earnings in real-time. Import HubSpot deals to automate the commission process. Close more deals, grow your revenue, and motivate your team.
blogPost.title: QuotaPath + HubSpot integration - Calculate earnings & attainment from HubSpot deals
blogPost.author: Darby Dupre

localize.description: QuotaPath已与HubSpot整合! 有了这个CRM集成，销售代表可以实时跟踪配额的实现和收益。导入HubSpot交易以自动化佣金流程。完成更多交易，增加您的收入，并激励您的团队。
localize.tagline: 计算HubSpot交易的收益和成就。

localize.description: QuotaPath已與HubSpot整合! 有了這個CRM集成，銷售代表可以實時跟蹤配額的實現和收益。導入HubSpot交易以自動化佣金流程。完成更多交易，增加您的收入，並激勵您的團隊。
localize.tagline: 計算HubSpot交易的收益和成就。

previous.excerpt: Workplace scores, by Blind. Take a brief survey to see culture & and sentiment ratings by verified employees. You can use Blind Pulse on the Blind app.
previous.title: Blind Pulse - Workplace culture & sentiment ratings by verified employees

localize.description: 工作场所评分，由盲。通过简单的调查，查看经过验证的员工对企业文化和情感的评价。您可以在Blind应用上使用Blind Pulse。
localize.tagline: 经过验证的员工对工作场所文化和情绪的评价。

localize.description: 工作場所評分，由盲。通過簡單的調查，查看經過驗證的員工對企業文化和情感的評價。您可以在Blind應用上使用Blind Pulse。
localize.tagline: 經過驗證的員工對工作場所文化和情緒的評價。

next.excerpt: https://facet.ai is building the future of AI-assistive creative work. Our mission is to empower professional creatives and teams to collaborate seamlessly on art direction and spend less time pushing pixels.
next.title: Facet - Content-aware image editing in your browser.

localize.description: https://facet.ai 正在打造人工智能辅助创意工作的未来。我们的使命是赋能专业的创意人员和团队，让他们在艺术指导上无缝协作，减少推送像素的时间。
localize.tagline: 在浏览器中进行内容感知的图像编辑。

localize.description: https://facet.ai 正在打造人工智能輔助創意工作的未來。我們的使命是賦能專業的創意人員和團隊，讓他們在藝術指導上無縫協作，減少推送像素的時間。
localize.tagline: 在瀏覽器中進行內容感知的圖像編輯。
